categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The "high place" was the name of an ancient Taung fortress located on the planet Coruscant, in a time long before the foundation of the Galactic Republic. The fortress displayed the banners of Olhak the Reaver, and was the gathering place of the Taung warriors under Rexutu the Unconquerable as they prepared to clash with the Battalions of Zhell during the battle that would see the Taung take on the name of Dha Werda Verda.

The fortress known as the "high place" was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, co-authored by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart, and published April 3, 2012.
